item.title: Major Changes for v2.0
item.description: The most fundamental changes that will be made in this version are: Mobile-first approach Tania should be able to be used on the field that is often not appropriate for laptop or PC usage. Therefore, with the mobile-first approach, Tania can be more easily used on smartphone without fear of missing data being stored. User Journey Some experiences on v1.5 are not designed properly and we know that it is frustrating for some people.
